All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
DatePriceManager
Manages the date price rates of a hotel.
DatePriceRate
Represents the rate for a specific date.
DeluxeRoom
Represents a Deluxe room in a hotel.
DiscountedReservation
Represents a discounted reservation for a hotel room.
ExecutiveRoom
Represents an Executive room in a hotel.
Hotel
Represents a hotel, containing managers for its rooms, reservations, and date price rates.
Reservation
Represents a reservation for a hotel room.
ReservationManager
Manages the list of reservations in a hotel.
ReservationSystem
Represents a reservation system that manages a collection of hotels.
Room
Represents a room of a hotel.
RoomManager
Manages the list of rooms in a hotel.
StandardRoom
Represents a Standard room in a hotel.
